system.armourTypes: Mesh, Carapace, or Power Armour that covers all locations and not sealed.
system.effect:
Armour becomes sealed and wearer can survive for 6 hours in a vacuum without adverse effects such as suffocation.
Decrease Armour Availability by 1 (Rare-->Very Rare)

description.value: Armour becomes sealed and wearer can survive for 6 hours in a vacuum without adverse effects such as suffocation. Decrease Armour Availability by 1 (Rare-->Very Rare)
